about.name: Watcharapon (Kane) Weeraborirak
about.title: AI & Cloud Systems Engineer
about.headline: From models to impact.
about.summary: I turn geospatial and AI research into reliable, cloud-scale systems with measurable outcomes.

pillars.title: AI Engineering
bullets: Latency-sensitive inference with evaluation harnesses, guardrails, cost observability

pillars.title: Data Engineering
bullets: Serverless ETL/ELT with Step Functions, Glue, S3
Governance with Lake Formation, schema lineage

pillars.title: Cloud Architecture
bullets: Edge delivery with CloudFront and global networking

work.title: Carbon Watch
work.subtitle: Geospatial AI for Forest Integrity
work.summary: Carbon assessment engine with unified ingestion, raster analytics, and reporting.
work.description: Architected a serverless, multi-hop pipeline with Lambda, SageMaker, and PostGIS to transform heterogenous geospatial data into carbon readiness assessments and executive dashboards.

work.title: AI4ALL @ Thaicom
work.subtitle: Enterprise GenAI Platform
work.summary: Secure LLM ecosystem with LibreChat, Entra ID, RAG, and policy-based routing.
work.description: Delivered authentication, prompt safety, moderation, and evaluation for internal GenAI adoption spanning Bedrock, OpenAI, and proprietary content.

work.title: EasyStay Asia
work.subtitle: Serverless Hospitality Platform
work.summary: Booking + payments + automations; availability sync and BI.
work.description: Led the full-stack build from API to automation, orchestrating reservations, payments, and communications via event-driven services.

work.title: Pasa Education
work.subtitle: Learning Platform Automation
work.summary: Course management, progress tracking, and billing.
work.description: Delivered a modular LMS with workflow automation, realtime notifications, and analytics on learner behaviour.

highlights: Built multilingual chatbot pipelines ingesting Facebook + LINE data with KNN segmentation and Naive Bayes spam filtering
Delivered face-recognition attendance powered by DLIB and GPU-accelerated inference
Designed microservices for LINE Developer quotation flows backed by event-driven messaging
Engineered async geospatial workflows across Lambda, SageMaker, and S3 powering Carbon Watch
Built serverless ELT with AWS Glue + PostGIS for automated spatial ingestion and validation
Integrated secure GenAI access with Entra ID, Bedrock, Anthropic, and OpenAI via LibreChat and MCP
Designed serverless booking platforms with integrated payments and automations
Launched e-learning ecosystems with async workflows and analytics
Consulted on AI platform roadmaps, governance, and enablement

faq.question: What is Kane focused on right now?
faq.answer: I’m currently designing geospatial AI and GenAI platforms for large teams while helping startups ship serverless products faster.

faq.question: Is Kane available for new consulting engagements?
faq.answer: I usually take on 1–2 high-impact engagements per quarter. Send over your goals and timeline for a fit check.
